sentence.Network_en: Marriage and funeral rites, and shamanist rituals for curing illnesses, survive.
sentence.Network_cn: 留存下来的习俗还有婚礼 、 葬礼及治病的驱邪仪式.

list.abs: Tibetan Buddhism also incorporates the monastic disciplines of early Theravada Buddhism and the shamanistic features of the indigenous Tibetan religion , Bon .藏传佛教也把早期小乘佛教的僧侣纪律和西藏本土宗教笨教和萨满教的特征合并在一起。

I saw a Uygur woman wearing a Muslim head cover and holding her baby , whose head she had shaved into phantasmagoric designs , a pre-Islamic shamanistic practice to frighten away baby-stealing evil spirits .我看到一个戴着穆斯林头巾的维族妇女抱着她的孩子，孩子的头部被剃成幽灵的图案，这是早期伊斯兰萨满教
shamanistic culture has typicalness and incomparable specific character in all the primitive religions on the world .萨满教文化在世界各地原始宗教现象中都具有典型性和不可比拟的宗教个性。
